name: A-DEV-Enture! - A BTP Game Jam Entry!
name_original: A-DEV-Enture! - A BTP Game Jam Entry!
description:
MY FIRST COMPLETE GAME!

This is the story of a gamedeveloper. The story of a man with many bugs. The story of a man who started on a project of LEGENDS called a "GAME JAM". This young protagonist boldly ventured throughout his own household to fix all the bugs in his GAME JAM. He had made it into his bedroom, and then realized his mission. He had to make it through his house, defeat his biggest bug, THE BOSS BUG. the bug that was guarding the terminal. Then, finally he would make it to the terminal and patch all the bugs...

--

TEAM:

--

DIRECTED BY JHONXAY

PROGRAMMER: JHONXAY  ARTISTS: JAREN JHONXAY LORDCLOUD ZEUSN MUSICIANS AND SOUND DESIGN: HITTO

COMPLETE GAME PLANNED!
